title: Project Registration Request (PRR)
description: Used by a project developer to request the formal registration of a project from the Independent Impact Standards Body.

id_msg_pred_drcir.title: Message ID of DR-CIR
id_msg_pred_drcir.description: Message ID of the 'Document Review: PDD Certificate Issuance Request' (DR-CIR) that approved the project's PDD:

url_ipfs_pred_drcir.title: IPFS URL of DR-CIR
url_ipfs_pred_drcir.description: IPFS URL of the 'Document Review: PDD Certificate Issuance Request' (DR-CIR) that approved the project's PDD:
